languages.text: {n}Невзирая на многие часы, потраченные на молитвы над приборной панелью, и окроплением деталей священными маслами, Эксплораторы не смогли пробудить и подчинить машинный дух Горнила. Посрамленные неудачей, техножрецы не смогли довести диспут до победы — артефакт был объявлен святыней.{/n}

{n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Невзирая на многие часы, потраченные на молитвы над приборной панелью, и окроплением деталей священными маслами, Эксплораторы не смогли пробудить и подчинить машинный дух Горнила. Посрамленные неудачей, техножрецы не смогли довести диспут до победы — артефакт был объявлен святыней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In spite of many hours spent praying at the dashboard and sprinkling the details with the blessed oils, the Explorators could not arouse the machine spirit of the Crucible from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests could not win the dispute — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

{n}In spite of many hours spent praying at the dashboard and sprinkling the details with the blessed oils, the Explorators could not arouse the machine spirit of the Crucible from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests could not win the dispute — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

{n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests could not win the dispute — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

{n}In spite of many hours spent praying over the dashboard and anointing parts with blessed oils, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests could not win the dispute — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

{n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

{n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

{n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管开拓者花了许多小时在机器仪表盘边进行祈祷，用神圣机油涂抹部件，但他们依然无法唤醒沉睡的熔炉机魂。由于这场可耻的失败，技术神甫在论战中落败，这件造物最终被宣布为圣物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管开拓者花了许多小时在机器仪表盘边进行祈祷，用神圣机油涂抹部件，但他们依然无法唤醒沉睡的熔炉机魂。由于这场可耻的失败，技术神甫在论战中落败，这件造物最终被宣布为圣物。{/n}
{n}尽管开拓者花了许多小时在仪表盘边进行祈祷，用圣油涂抹部件，但他们依然无法唤醒沉睡的熔炉机魂。由于可耻的失败，技术神甫无法赢得这场争论，这件造物最终被宣布为圣物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de las horas dedicadas a rezar sobre el panel de la máquina y a purificar las piezas con ungüentos sagrados, los exploradores no pudieron despertar de su letargo al espíritu máquina del Crisol y domarlo. Deshonrados por el fracaso, los tecnosacerdotes perdieron la disputa: el artefacto fue declarado reliquia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de las horas dedicadas a rezar sobre el panel de la máquina y a purificar las piezas con ungüentos sagrados, los exploradores no pudieron despertar de su letargo al espíritu máquina del Crisol y domarlo. Deshonrados por el fracaso, los tecnosacerdotes perdieron la disputa: el artefacto fue declarado reliquia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エクスプロレイターは、何時間もダッシュボードの上で祈り、祝福の香油を部品に注いだにもかかわらず、坩堝の機械精霊を眠りから呼び覚まし、従わせることはできなかった。この失敗で名誉を傷つけられた技術司祭たちは議論に勝つことができず...故にこのアーティファクトは聖遺物とされた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エクスプロレイターは、何時間もダッシュボードの上で祈り、祝福の香油を部品に注いだにもかかわらず、坩堝の機械精霊を眠りから呼び覚まし、従わせることはできなかった。この失敗で名誉を傷つけられた技術司祭たちは議論に勝つことができず...故にこのアーティファクトは聖遺物とされた。{/n}
{n}エクスプロレイターは、何時間もダッシュボードの上で祈り、祝福の香油を部品に注いだにもかかわらず、坩堝の機械精霊を眠りから呼び覚まし、従わせることはできなかった。この失敗で名誉を傷つけられた技術司祭たちは議論に勝つことができず...故にこのアーティファクトは聖遺物とされた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré de nombreuses heures passées à prier devant son tableau de commande de la machine et à en oindre les pièces d'onguents sacrés, les Explorators ne peuvent tirer l'esprit de la machine du Creuset de son sommeil et le dompter. Humiliés par cet échec, les technoprêtres doivent s'avouer vaincus et l'artefact est reconnu comme une relique sainte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré de nombreuses heures passées à prier devant son tableau de commande de la machine et à en oindre les pièces d'onguents sacrés, les Explorators ne peuvent tirer l'esprit de la machine du Creuset de son sommeil et le dompter. Humiliés par cet échec, les technoprêtres doivent s'avouer vaincus et l'artefact est reconnu comme une relique sainte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trotz der vielen Stunden, die sie an der Steuerkonsole der Maschine gebetet und Teile mit gesegneten Ölen bestrichen haben, konnten die Exploratoren den Maschinengeist des Tiegels nicht aus seinem Schlaf wecken und zähmen. Entehrt durch dieses Versagen blieb den Techpriestern ihr Anspruch verwehrt und das Artefakt wurde zur Reliquie erklärt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz der vielen Stunden, die sie an der Steuerkonsole der Maschine gebetet und Teile mit gesegneten Ölen bestrichen haben, konnten die Exploratoren den Maschinengeist des Tiegels nicht aus seinem Schlaf wecken und zähmen. Entehrt durch dieses Versagen blieb den Techpriestern ihr Anspruch verwehrt und das Artefakt wurde zur Reliquie erklärt.{/n}

{n}Trotz der vielen stunden, die sie an der Steuerkonsole gebetet und Teile mit gesegneten Ölen gesalbt hatten, konnten die Exploratoren den Maschinengeist des Tiegels nicht aus seinem Schlaf wecken und zähmen. Entehrt durch dieses Versagen konnten die Techpriester den Disput nicht gewonnen. Das Artefakt wurde zur Reliquie erklärt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keşiftörler, makinenin panelinin üzerinde dua ederek ve parçalara kutsal özyağları sürerek uzun saatler geçirseler de Pota'nın makine ruhunu uykusundan uyandırıp ehlîleştirmeyi başaramadı. Bu başarısızlıkla gözden düşen Tekno Rahipler, tartışmayı kazanamadı. Eser, bir yadigâr olarak tanımlandı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In spite of the many hours spent praying over the machine's dashboard and anointing its parts with sacred unguents, the Explorators could not arouse the Crucible's machine spirit from its slumber and tame it. Disgraced by the failure, the Tech-Priests were defeated in their claim — the artefact was declared a relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Keşiftörler, makinenin panelinin üzerinde dua ederek ve parçalara kutsal özyağları sürerek uzun saatler geçirseler de Pota'nın makine ruhunu uykusundan uyandırıp ehlîleştirmeyi başaramadı. Bu başarısızlıkla gözden düşen Tekno Rahipler, tartışmayı kazanamadı. Eser, bir yadigâr olarak tanımlandı.{/n}
